fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Trade, Consumers, Energy, Environment, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action, Fraud prevention

goals__remit: Hague Corporate Affairs is a full service communication consultancy bureau that provides clients with strategy and action in an integrated approach to corporate communication and public affairs, in order to strengthen their reputation and achieve their goals. With every issue we look for the right mix of media and communication strategy, stakeholder approach and / or political lobby.
